info.title: TON API
info.description: API for interacting with The Open Network (TON) blockchain

get.description: Retrieves a list of NFT items from the TON blockchain

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of NFT items to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of NFT items to skip before starting to return results

address.description: The address of the NFT item
The address of the collection this item belongs to

index.description: The index of the NFT item within its collection

address.description: The address of the current owner of the NFT item

metadata.description: Additional metadata of the NFT item

verified.description: Whether the NFT item is verified

content_uri.description: The URI of the NFT item's content

raw_content_uri.description: The raw URI of the NFT item's content
